text:
question regarding the enrollment certificate. Mine just has a list of semesters I have been attending (eg "spring 2021: attending") without stating the exact dates of the semester. Is this enough? The gsoc page says
```If your card does not have an explicit date on it, it must indicate in some way that you are enrolled for the 2021 school year.```

elements.text: question regarding the enrollment certificate. Mine just has a list of semesters I have been attending (eg "spring 2021: attending") without stating the exact dates of the semester. Is this enough? The gsoc page says
If your card does not have an explicit date on it, it must indicate in some way that you are enrolled for the 2021 school year.

text: the semester exact dates are in the public university page, so I guess I could attach a page with a link. Not sure if google will bother clicking though

text: I suggest to use transcripts whenever possible
